page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: This area is mainly farmland and like the adjacent areas is mainly given over to market gardening.The area is famous for the production of strawberries.There are very few amenities to serve the sparse population.In the past decade there has been considerable housing development in the adjacent area which has seen the growth of an Industrial Estate in this area.The building of the M27 and M3 has made the Industrial Estate very well situated for distribution both along the south coast and to London.There are some 37 sites on the Estate and there is considerable expansion at present which is taking the perimeter of the Estate outside of this area.There is an important Government Victualling depot in the area.It is responsible for provisioning the Armed Forces.
